name: id
description: Used to assign an `id` in the HTML for the accordion as a whole, and also a prefix for the `id`s of the section panels and the buttons that open them, so that those `id`s can be the target of `aria-labelledby` and `aria-control` attributes.

name: headingLevel
description: Heading level, from 1 to 6. Default is 2.

name: items
descripion: An array of sections within the accordion.

params.name: label
params.description: The title of each section. If `label.html` is supplied, this is ignored.

params.name: label.html
params.description: The HTML content of the header for each section which is used both as the title for each section, and as the button to open or close each section.

params.name: content.html
params.description: The HTML content of each section, which is hidden when the section is closed.
